Class BookControl

java.lang.Object
org.Code.BookControl
public class BookControl extends Object
Controls borrowing, fines, and user-related operations for books and other media in the library system.

This class coordinates between Books, MediaCollection, Loan, and Users to:

  • Borrow media (books or CDs)
  • Check overdue items
  • Calculate fines
  • Unregister users (with conditions)

  • Method Details

    • numberOfBorrowedBooks

      public int numberOfBorrowedBooks()
      Counts how many borrowed items are currently recorded in src/main/InfoBase/Borrowed_Books.txt.

      If the file does not exist or an error occurs, this method returns 0.

      Returns:
      the number of borrowed records found in the file

    • borrowMedia

      public void borrowMedia(User user, String searchedWord)
      Attempts to borrow a media item (book or CD) for the given user, based on a search keyword.

      Borrowing will be blocked if:

      • The user has unpaid fines
      • The user has any overdue loans
      • The item cannot be found
      • The item is already borrowed
      On success, a new Loan is created, the item is marked as borrowed, and a message with the due date is printed to the console.
      Parameters:
      user - the user who is borrowing the item
      searchedWord - keyword used to search for the media in MediaCollection

    • getOverDueBooks

      public List<Loan> getOverDueBooks(LocalDate currentDate)
      Returns a list of all loans that are overdue relative to the provided date.
      Parameters:
      currentDate - the date used to check whether a loan is overdue
      Returns:
      list of overdue Loan objects

    • payFine

      public void payFine(User user, double amount)
      Allows a user to pay part or all of their fine balance. This simply delegates to User.payFine(double).
      Parameters:
      user - the user who is paying
      amount - the amount to pay

    • unregisterUser

      public void unregisterUser(User admin, User targetUser)
      Unregisters a target user from the system, if allowed.

      A user can be unregistered only if:

      • The caller is an admin (User.isAdmin())
      • The target user has no unpaid fines
      • The target user has no active or overdue loans
      If one of these conditions is not met, an explanatory message is printed and the operation is aborted.
      Parameters:
      admin - the admin user requesting the operation
      targetUser - the user to unregister

    • getLoans

      public List<Loan> getLoans()

    • setUsers

      public void setUsers(Users users)

    • calculateOverdueFine

      public double calculateOverdueFine(User user, LocalDate today)
      Calculates the total overdue fine for a specific user based on all loans managed by this controller.

      For each loan that is overdue as of today, the fine is: daysOverdue * item.getFinePerDay().

      Parameters:
      user - the user whose fines should be calculated
      today - the date used to determine overdue days
      Returns:
      total fine amount for the user

    • getAllOverdueMedia

      public List<Loan> getAllOverdueMedia(User user, LocalDate today)
      Returns all overdue loans for the given user as of the specified date.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose overdue media should be fetched
      today - the date used as the reference point for overdue calculation
      Returns:
      list of overdue Loan objects for the user
